title: Are you a movie critic? You might be great at CRO! With Sumantha Shankaranarayana
description:
We learn how Kaspersky approaches and combines CRO for B2B and B2C and how a movie critic might make you a great CRO!

Shownotes: https://www.cro.cafe/podcast/kaspersky

Podcast Partners: Convert.com, OnlineDialogue.com, Sitespect.com, Contentsquare.com and OnlineInfluence.com
